function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on social media for COVID-19 information","Impact":"Misinformation and incorrect guidance on COVID-19 containment","Mitigation":"Promoting official sources and fact-checking information","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, official information dissemination platforms","People":"General public, decision-makers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of fake news related to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased anxiety, false sense of security, and risk of non-compliance with official guidelines","Mitigation":"Promoting awareness of reliable sources, fact-checking technology, and media literacy","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, media literacy campaigns, reliable news platforms","People":"General public, decision-makers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Media organizations, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of social media on psychological well-being","Impact":"Increased anxiety, stress, and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Promoting positive content, mental health resources, and social media well-being guidelines","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, positive content promotion algorithms","People":"General public, mental health professionals, social media users","Owner":"Psychological and mental health organizations"}]}
